package.name: mir_compute_shift_relative_distances
package.description:
1. Clear previous information (move relative distances dictionary) 2. look left (with arm) 3. recognize objects 4. compute global poses (in front of objects) and accumulate them 5. look right (with arm) 6. recognize objects 7. compute global poses and accumulate
result: end product of this action is a list of poses in map/odom frame that the robot needs to move to in order to be in front of the objects.
package.author: Oscar Lima
